page.title: 03Day In Life Of Mrs Carse.
page.content: {(Farmer's Wife.) Morning. 06:30 Got up ran over to vegetable garden to chase any marauding birds. Let out our two collies.Had breakfast- fruit juice,cereal,toast,marmalade and tea. 07:20 Took Edwin to catch bus to Kenneth Wilson Cereal Trials in Yorkshire. 08:30 Took girls to school by car. Did washing,made beds, tidied up. 10:00 Aydon and I had juice/coffee and biscuits.Started to paint utility room assisted?by Aydon.Briefly interupted by a machinery rep.looking for Edwin,and Granny who called in for a chat. 12:00 Had lunch omlette,salad,cheese and biscuits.Switched on T.V.to see BBC 1 Weather Report-weather still unsettled so haymaking prospects poor.
